title: Bottle Booking
cardText:
In order to proceed with your table and lifestyle requests, you must add at least a payment method.
We do not store your credit card information.
All payment processing is handled by Stripe® using bank-level security. Stripe® is certified to PCI Service Provider Level 1.
missingPicturePopup: To go next step, you must upload a picture
welcome: Welcome to Bottle Booking, the first private booking application for VIP Tables and Luxury Services
passwordCharacters: Your password must be composed of at least 6 alphanumeric characters
overEighteen: You must be over 18 years to join us
enterYourLocation:
Specify the main city
where you live
enterYourNumber: Specify your main number to get your activation code
geolocalisationText: Turn on « Geolocation » to directly access to events and services in your city.
notificationstext: Turn on « Notifications » in order to receive our Chat Messages and our Recommendations
contactstext: Turn on « Contacts » in order to invite easily your friends and to share events and services with them
thank:
Thanks for your interest in BottleBooking services.
An Operator will review your inquiry shortly.
You’ll be notified by SMS and push notifications.
Please make sure the BottleBooking app is allowed to send push notifications by checking your settings
iAgree: I accept the terms and conditions
getMiles: Book and get your first BB Miles
addYourAddress: Add your full address to receive your Member Card
noEvent: Dear member, there is no event in this city during this period. Feel free to ask us anything :
paymentLoadingText: Dear Member, you will not be charged until your Booking is Confirmed
paymentFailedText: Your payment authorization has failed, please use another card
paymentSuccessText:
Thank you, your booking request has been sent.
A manager is checking availability and will get back to you as soon as possible.
guestModePopup: Please wait while your membership request is beeing submitted.
discoverModePopup: You are in Discovery Mode, please ask for Membership or wait for access.
updateLocationPopup: You can change your city one time per year. To update your city, please ask your concierge.
resetPasswordPopup: Enter your email to reset your password.
confirmResetPasswordPopup: Your password has been reset, a temporary password has been sent to your mail box.
failedResetPasswordPopup: Your email could not be found.
bookingConfirmPopup: Congratulations ! Your Booking is now Confirmed.
alertPersonPopup: You have to specify at least one people to go on.
alertForecastPopup: You must set a minimum budget.
ratingPopup: You can rate your experience from 1 to 5 stars.
facebookErrorPopup: Sync with your facebook account failed, please try again later.
cancelBookingPopup: Are you sure to cancel this Booking ?
deleteCreditCard: Are you sure to delete this credit card ?
suggestCityText: Suggest a city you want to see on BottleBooking
managementFeesDescription:
Management fees cover all our Services to ensure you everything will go well. They are according to the time you’ve requested your table.
The pourcentage will be automatically adjusted. The more you approach the event, the more the pourcentage will evolve.
depositDescription:
Some venues require a deposit to secure Bookings and Tables. You could be asked to leave 10 to 100% deposit in advance and pay the rest at the venue.
Once your Booking is Confirmed with our Team and the Club Manager, your party is setting aside a table especially for you.
coverChargesDescription: Some venues require the payment of an entry fee per guest.
